meanings.sent1: The boring video was uninstructive and didn't teach me anything.
meanings.sent2: The pamphlet was uninstructive, leaving me confused about the topic.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's uninstructive explanation made the students fall asleep in class.
meanings.sent4: The map was so uninstructive that we got lost for hours.
meanings.sent5: The signs were so uninstructive that we missed the turn and ended up in the wrong city.

meanings.sent1: The uninstructive lesson left the students puzzled and unsure of the topic.
meanings.sent2: The uninstructive workshop failed to provide any useful skills to the participants.
meanings.sent3: The uninstructive tutorial on fixing the car resulted in more damage than before.
meanings.sent4: The uninstructive training session was like trying to learn to swim on dry land.
meanings.sent5: The uninstructive textbook made studying for the exam feel like a waste of time.
